New Records: Ja Morant scored a 12th career triple-double
Victor Wembanyama had his second '5x5' game in his career
Hakeem Olajuwon and Andrei Kirilenko are the only other players with multiple '5x5' games in their careers
Key Match Events: Ja Morant led the Memphis Grizzlies to a 122-99 win over the Milwaukee Bucks
Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 37 points and grabbed 11 rebounds but the Bucks still lost
Victor Wembanyama scored 25 points with nine rebounds, seven assists, five steals and five blocked shots in the Spurs' 106-88 win over the Jazz
Pre-Game Insights: The Bucks are clearly missing the contribution of injured Khris Middleton
The Grizzlies were looking to bounce back from a lethargic loss to the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant said 'Everybody was kind of in a good rhythm, we got it going early'
Doc Rivers said 'I thought we played with the right spirit, but we didn't make shots and you're going to have nights like that. But on those nights we have to find a way to get stops'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets finally got the better of their Texas rivals, leading by as many as 23 points and hanging on for a 108-102 victory
The Suns notched their second come-from-behind victory over the Clippers in eight days
The Grizzlies had seven players score in double figures
Others: The game between the Grizzlies and Bucks was played on Thursday
The game between the Rockets and Mavs was played in Dallas
The game between the Spurs and Jazz was played in San Antonio
